name: Tower Defense (Help TM)
description:
Definitely a work in progress. Hopefully I will remember to update it as I go. You can play the game for free at Construct 3's website. No download needed except for the game files. I will eventually fully export this to HTML 5 when the project is developed enough.

The plan for the game to make a tower defense game where during waves you fight the enemies too, so that you aren't sitting there doing nothing as your base falls. Hugely inspired by https://z-richman.itch.io/two-timin-towers, and Vimlark.
